Greeting and thanks for your interest in my post :) Super nice bedrooms available with awesome roommates for 1 person but you can have overnight visitors now and then :). When you email me please state the room and date you are interested in and a little about yourself so we can save time and I can give you the exact location and details of the specific unit.
We are a community of young professionals, in our 20`s, 30`s and 40`s. Mainly males but also a few females. We are all friends working at Stanford, Google, Optibase, Yahoo. Cisco, eBay, Firefox, Apple, Facebook, Rocketfuel, NASA, IBM, Intel, LinkedIn etc.
We are not an agency or company, just roommates living a healthy life style searching for a happy positive roommate to share our homes with. We offer a very unique living situation in a very positive environment, sharing all common areas, full kitchen and living areas privileges. We share all utilities, rent and housekeeping costs as well as responsibility to organize trips and social events.
Imagine coming home to a clean, peaceful, relaxing environment, having a chat while sharing dinner with like-minded friends and roommates.
If you`re looking for clean, comfortable accommodations, flexible lease terms, added amenities, and super affordable rates you have come to the right place! Whether you are a Silicon Valley entrepreneur, are relocating to start a new job, are in transition, are going through a divorce, are an intern or student, or just need a place to live while you get back on your feet, our homes have the solution for all your needs.
Boutique accommodation complete with life`s little luxuries. A holistic life experience tailored specifically for you. Short or long term fully or semi furnished rooms that allow you to enjoy life. We are committed to ensuring an exceptional, memorable home away from home experience, providing a warm and fun environment.
You can store and cook your own food, eliminating the need for expensive outside dining. Roommates are hand-picked to ensure an ideal living/sharing situation that is suitable for all. Our commitment to innovation depends on everyone being comfortable sharing ideas and opinions. All our homes are exquisitely furnished and have a zen feel to them with a touch of Feng Shui.
Our rooms have mattress pillows and cushions, matching curtains and bed linen, and candles to give them a very peaceful atmosphere. The bathrooms are also very nicely decorated and include all the necessities and towels. The kitchens are fully equipped and basic cooking and cleaning supplies are provided. Wi-Fi is provided in all rooms and common areas.
Our extra Housekeeping service is offered to ensure your comfort and once more to take care of those details while you focus on what matters most in your life at this time. One day you will lie on your bed and realize that your sheets have been changed and are smelling of nature, your room is organized and cleaned with love.
From the very first moment you arrive at any of our homes you`re welcomed into a sanctuary of tranquility that will embrace and awaken your mind, body and spirit. You will be looking forward to coming home each day!! Our promise to you.
Please no smokers, drug users, party animals, heavy drinkers, drama queens, or MESSY people need to reply, all though, we are open minded and accept people for who they are, we prefer to keep our home free of the above mention.
We welcome vegetarians and vegans but please keep in mind that not all roommates are vegetarian and we do cook and store meet, pots are shared so please note that we do not expect you to change your eating habits to accommodate to us or vice versa.
Currently we are seeking roommates for our very nice 3 bedroom 2 bath home, fully furnish bedroom, queen size bed, desk, chair, dresser, lamp, candles, all linen and pillows included, bathrooms are also ready with towels, toilet paper, soaps, hand lotions etc.
All the homes have a no pet, no smoking and 1 person per room policy, if you are a female most likely you will have to share the bathroom with another very respectful male roommate, the pictures are model pictures each room is decorated very similar but the color of the sheets and curtains will change depending on the room.

postings.body: This gorgeously remodeled 3-bedroom condo in the Tahoe Keys resort is simply perfect for your next luxury vacation. Located in a very pet-friendly area, this condo features a stunning fireplace, a community hot tub, a boat dock, a community pool, and much, much more. The wood floors, accents, and decor throughout this condo give it a very rustic, woodsy feel, all while keeping to a modern feel as well. The main living area features lots of light and a comfortable little couch, some big, cozy chairs, and a gorgeous fireplace built into the wall. There`s a nice-sized TV right next to the fireplace as well, and it can be seen from all of the main communal areas of the home. Right next to the living area you`ll find the dining area, which features a big table with bench seating and really nice linoleum flooring. The kitchen cabinets are done in a nice wood accent and there`s lots of counter space in the kitchen as well. The kitchen also includes a bar/island that can serve as additional seating during meal time, if you need it. The bedrooms in this home are all carpeted with a plush, beige carpeting and all of the beds are big, cozy, and feature nice big quilts on them. One of the bedrooms even has its own sliding-glass door that leads right out onto the yards and towards the piers and boat docks. The master bedroom in this condo could even serve as a separate living area: it features a nice TV, some additional seating, and a really nice bathroom. Additional amenities include a fireplace, a washer and dryer, a BBQ, a boat dock, a TV with DVD player, a dishwasher, and more. The main attractions at this condo are the community amenities and the outdoor spaces. There`s a nice little patio right outside the main living area that is perfect for relaxing, having your morning coffee and reading the paper, or just chatting with friends. It overlooks the water and the piers surrounding you. This patio leads down across the lawn and towards the boat docks and piers. Your kids and pets will really love all of this open lawn, which is perfect for play time in both the summer and the winter. Staying in this condo will also give you access to many of the amazing amenities included with the Tahoe Keys Resort. You`ll have access to a community swimming pool, a community hot tub, community grills, and the piers and boat docks that sit right next to you on the water. And don`t forget: this condo is pet friendly, so you can take your furry friends wherever you go. If you`re looking for a modern, upscale, pet-friendly condo with lots of community amenities and a very cozy vibe, then look no further than this gorgeous, newly remodeled condo. You can park your boat and it fits boat up to 28 FT. Located on Standish Street in the center of Town, less than two blocks from Commercial Street , the Wharf and Ferries. Originally built c.1850, this home exudes Provincetown character and charm with the class and style today`s vacationer wants. The house has been totally renovated & well appointed.

The hardwood floors have been restored throughout and there are window a/c`s in the bedrooms and both floor and ceiling fans.
The house has 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms on three floors. The first floor master suite has it`s own entrance & includes a living room area with 32` HDTV, kitchenette, full bathroom with shower, and separate bedroom with new king bed.
Up stairs on the second floor is the main living area. There are two bedrooms (king/queen), a full bathroom with shower, a dining table with chairs and the kitchen and living area share a great room with lots of windows.
Up the stairs to the third floor is the master suite. A generous sized room, there is a new Simmons World Class King Bed and an en suite bathroom with tile floor, and claw tub.
There is a deck off the second floor and steps leading to the yard. The large yard is fenced and full of mature gardens, a large seating area and a gas grill .

postings.body: This spacious 3-bedroom mountain home offers a large loft, a pool table/gaming table, a private hot tub, massive decks, and, most importantly, gorgeous mountain views. Hiking and biking trails are just 1 block away and, in the wintertime, there is a great sledding hill right out the back door of the cabin. The house has 2 very large decks, 3 TVs, 2 DVD players, 3 VCRs, a stereo/CD player, a gas BBQ, a gas fireplace, and a gaming table that features pool, shuffleboard, and other games. If you`re looking for a big home with lots of extra amenities and some spectacular views, look no further than this cabin! The two massive decks attached to this home are perhaps its best features, and the top deck includes a big hot tub you can relax in after a long day at the slopes or on the beach. Additionally, as you sit in the hot tub you can gaze out at the trees and mountains and there is no doubt you will simply be awestruck by the beauty surrounding you. This 3-level home has tile and hardwood floors throughout and plenty of big, comfy couches and chairs to watch movies in, read books in, or simply lounge about and chat in. The kitchen is large and the cabin`s open floor plan connects the kitchen to the dining area as well as the living area. There`s a small island/bar next to the back entrance and a nice-sized dining table, too. postings.body: Completely renovated in the summer of 2013, this studio apartment is a joy to experience. Second floor walk-up with two large, sunny windows facing the back of the building. Very private and you don`t get Charles St. traffic noise. Non-working but gorgeous marble fireplace. The "small is beautiful" mantra fits in every way. It includes a fully equipped, extremely functional kitchen with new appliances, an eat-in kitchen counter, living room, desk, dining table and chairs and a cozy bed nook that is hidden from view. Quality linens and towels. The bathroom has a shiny new tub and vanity that fit in beautifully with the 1920`s black and white basket weave tile floor. The owner/architectural designer has anticipated your every need and provides you with a beautiful little package that is so inviting, it feels like you`ve stepped into your own new home. annotations.source_heading: Fabulous One Bedroom Apartment in Charles Street!

postings.heading: Fabulous One Bedroom Apartment in Charles Street

postings.body:
We`ve been in Seattle for about a year but moved into this house at the beginning of July and are looking to fill the master because our third person backed out last minute. Rent for the master would be $1300/month with a 1-year lease, starting on 8/1. We do have a cat, but he`s super friendly and floppy and enjoys playing fetch (we treat him like a dog.)
 What you`d get:
 Large unfurnished master bedroom on the main floor with walk-in closet. No en-suite bathroom, but the main floor`s bathroom is right next to the bedroom. The other two bedrooms are on the lower floor and share a bathroom, so the main floor`s would be mostly your`s except for when friends come over.
 Partially furnished common spaces - we`ve got a TV, a big couch, a small couch, foosball table, and a smattering of other random furniture collected over the past year. We`re still in the process of getting settled and plan on getting more furniture as we get adjusted to the house.
 Free street parking (you don`t even need a permit).
 Rent includes w/s/g.
 Details about the house, overall:
 Chef`s kitchen with stainless steel appliances, butcher block counter tops, tons of storage, and a great breakfast nook with plenty of light
 Huge living room, dining room, and yard. There`s a great view from the living room/front porch/yard of the city and Rainier on clear days.
 Convenient location close to 99 so there are a lot of bus stops within a few minutes of walking. Getting to Westlake Center takes about 15-20 minutes on the bus, depending on traffic. 5 is also easily accessible.
 The really good restaurants on 45th are a dangerously close five minute walk away. There`s also a nearby QFC.
 It`s a nice five mile loop if you run/bike from the house to all the way around Green Lake and back. Fremont and U-District are also within easy biking distance.
 Some info about us:
We`re two good friends who met in college and moved to Seattle last summer for work (tech start-up and consulting). We`re both girls, but we`ve lived with guys in the past and don`t mind doing so again. We enjoy spending time outside - hiking, ultimate frisbee, etc. - and love cooking and food. We go out most weekends, but also enjoy staying in and taking it easy to recharge. We are ideally looking for a roommate in their 20s that we can hang out with - the two of us have lived together in a house before that had a "family" vibe.
If you made it to the end of this post and are interested, shoot us an email with a short description about yourself and any questions you have!

DESCRIPTION
~Balboa Pearl~
Balboa Pearl is a classic beach gem, offering a wide range of amenities and a highly desirable upper-Peninsula location. Big on both style and value, the Balboa Pearl was recently remodeled and features all-new contemporary furnishings and tasteful decor in neutral colors. Floors consist of hardwood and ceramic tile, which provide a perfect backdrop for beach living. Fresh paint, enhanced baseboard mouldings and contemporary window coverings lend additional warmth and style to this charming residence. Situated on a quiet residential street less than a block from the warm sands of Newport Beach, the single-story Spanish-style cottage will make you feel right at home. The Pearl features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms in approximately 1,100 square feet and can accommodate up to 8 guests. The master bedroom features a brand-new Queen sized bed complete with luxury linens. A set of twin beds can be found in the guest room, while the living room also includes a pull-out sleeper sofa. A third bedroom in the rear of the cottage has the added feature of a private exterior keyed entry -- making it perfect for sharing with a second couple, extended family or visitors. Within the rear guest suite is a full bathroom and a large desk area, as well as a wardrobe and plenty of storage space. The Pearl boasts state-of-the-art electronics and has 4 brand-new flat screen TVs. A TV/DVD combo is located in each bedroom and also in the living room. The living room television also has a Blu-ray DVD player. Complimentary wireless internet access (WiFi) can be found throughout the home. Each bedroom is also equipped with a remote-controlled ceiling fan and the home has a heating system for chilly winter evenings. The cottage`s main bathroom features a renovated shower/tub combo and showcases beautiful tile work and top-quality fixtures. Balboa Pearl`s spacious kitchen is well-outfitted with everything needed to create a fabulous gourmet meal or a simple supper. Appliances include a brand-new dishwasher as well as a recently upgraded microwave, oven/range and refrigerator. All appliances feature black finishes. Black Galaxy countertops also enhance the kitchen and provide an upscale feel. The adjacent dining area features an elegant 4-seat dining table - although many Pearl guests will opt to do their dining outside on the spacious front patio. The patio effectively extends the home`s living space and provides a perfect setting for morning coffee or al fresco dining. A dining table and additional chairs encourage restful evenings and a gas barbecue is provided for outdoor cooking. A view of the ocean and fresh sea breezes can be enjoyed from the patio, while delighting in the beach-town ambiance. Guests will also appreciate the hot & cold outdoor shower that is located on the east side of the cottage -- perfect for rinsing off after a day in the surf and sand. The Pearl also has a laundry room with a full-size washer and dryer and a separate utility area with plenty of storage space. Garage parking for a single car is provided on the rear side of the property and a temporary unloading spot is available directly in front of the garage. Whether you`re planning a long-weekend at the beach or a stay for much longer, the Balboa Pearl will accommodate you with comfort and class. All the joys of Southern California`s most beautiful beaches lay just outside your door.

**DUE TO THE OVERWHELMING AMOUNT OF SPAM I`M RECEIVING, if you respond to this ad DO NOT ask me if the "room" is still available.
1) If the ad is up I`m still looking for a housemate, and 2) Include your name and please say something about yourself. Thanx, Joe :)
 Housemate Wanted to Share 3 br, 2.5 bath Townhouse with 2 other occupants
 THE DETAILS - We need 1 more house mate to share a fully furnished, (except the BedRoom you will be moving into) 3 BR, 2.5 bath town house in Lafayette on a quiet, private rd. Tons of storage, lots of parking, incredibly close to Trader Joe`s, down town Lafayette and BART, pool 20 ft away, garage (for storage, bicycles, motorcycles tools, etc, ...) washer and dryer, 2 refrigerators, fully equipped kitchen, 2 brand new stoves, brand new cook top and brand new dish-washer, fireplace, maid service, ... yata, yata, yata! This place is really nice, extremely spacious, quiet, and incredibly safe. Neighbors are awesome.
 WHAT YOU GET - You get 1 bedroom, (just over 10" x 10" and a closet) shared full bathroom with 1 roommate, use of all common areas of the house. Plenty of storage. Hi-def cable, ( Hi-def cable in your room as well) big screen TV, phone (land) line, and fax, SBC DSL and all the other usual stuff. (If you need more space, storage or anything we can make that happen)
 WHAT IT COSTS - You`re share will be $650 TOTAL, That will cover ALL monthly charges plus $650 Safety Deposit.
 TESTIMONIAL - This really is a great place to live. I have been here for 10 years now. My last roommates will vouch for me and what an awesome place this is. All the neighbors are friendly and courteous.
 You really can`t find a much nicer place to call home.
 ME - Joe - 49 yr old male, NON-SMOKER, trustworthy, quiet, like to cook, pretty clean, courteous, very friendly and out going, college educated, slightly anal about a clean kitchen but other than that VERY easy to get along with. Big on morals and ethics. (you need to be Big On Morals and Ethics AS WELL!!!)
 The Other Housemate - Brandon - 45 yr old male (smoker) Quiet, clean, courteous, keeps to himself, very clean and is hardly ever home.
 YOU - Nonsmoker preferred, courteous, friendly, clean, trustworthy, easy to get along with. Male or Female OK
I absolutely do not discriminate against race, color, ethnicity, gender, Yata Yata and we DON`T need to be best friends but we will need to get along. Life is too short to live with someone you don`t get along with so I reserve the right to choose the applicant that I feel will be the best fit. Oh, and you should feel the same about me.
 MOVE IN TIME -- August 1, 2014
Shoot me an email and we can talk and you can have a look around.
 PS. I have a dog. He weighs 19 pounds and is extremely lovable, VERY friendly and VERY well trained. You will not have to interact with him if you don`t want to (wow!! pretty hard not to though) but if you do, he`ll be be your best friend. Oh, and he doesn`t hardly shed at all :-) and NEVER EVER goes in the house. Again, house is pretty spotless. I also have friends that come over w/ very well behaved dogs from time to time so you should at least like dogs, ...I`m guessing.

postings.body:
Sorry Craiglist I`m back, I know I hate double posts too. I had to refine my search. I`m looking for someone who actually has their sh*t together.
***Those with no credit history (650 or less score), job history, or references need not apply.***
***Price range 1250-1500 PER PERSON***
***No Pets***
If I haven`t gotten back to your e-mails yet I`m sorry for not responding I`ve been short on time and trying to keep up with everyone`s budgets/situations in a log to help make a decision.
What I`m seeking:
I`m a 25 y/o male professional, graduated from a university in 2010 and recently moved to SB for a new job. I`m seeking someone who`s in a similar situation and wanting to have their own space at a fraction of the cost of a 1BR on their own.
Lifestyle:
I`d describe myself as a social athletic nerd. I like laughing and making others laugh. I am a kind and generous person who has a great family. Want to ride bikes/go running/go paddleboarding? I`m in. Want to play soccer/kickball/tennis/surf/snowboard/wakeboard? I`m in. But also: want to play FIFA? COD? NBA 2k? I`m in, and I`ll beat you. Can`t figure out why you WiFi/computer/game console/tv/electronic device isn`t working properly? I can probably fix it. Want to buy something for a good deal? I can find it for you. I recently became addicted to finding deals on literally everything I purchase, and I would happily take on purchasing shared household goods which will save us both money. Imagine never running out of TP or paper towels, pretty sweet right?
Partying:
Everyone posting on craigslist is so uptight! I like being social, but I also like the sound of silence too. I was in a frat in college and have been to more than a few parties, but now that I work full time and have bills to pay I really only go out drinking once or twice a week. I am really not interested in throwing parties at the apartment, but I don`t want either of us restricted from having guests over. I also like BBQing so possible get-togethers during the day may be in order. Lastly, I do have friends that want to come visit from out of town sometimes, so you should be OK with that. In a nutshell, as long as we discuss with each other our plans I`m sure we can work it out.
Cleanliness:
With most postings, it looks like OCD cleanliness is required, but let`s get real. Common places take priority and will need to be kept presentable and clean. If I have a busy week my room might get cluttered, but I won`t let that spread to common areas. Take responsibility for your own messes, but if the place needs a quick clean in general, I have no problem with the both of us pitching in to clean up, nor am I opposed to splitting the cost of regular cleaning service.
When:
Aug 1st/Sept 1st Hopefully Aug 1 or early August but I think extending my search for a month might work best as far as finding something I`m happy to sign a lease on.
Location:
Downtown, Mesa, Upper State Area, or would consider Riviera
Size:
2BR2BR
********Edited*********
PRICE:
Let`s just narrow this down a bit...
$1250-1500 each person
There are some AWWEEESOOOOMEEE places in this price range. If we find cheaper great, but I`d rather show you what I mean with examples and you won`t want to settle. I have a few listings in this range I`ve spotted online if you`re interested e-mail a response and I`ll share them if you want to apply quickly.
**********[edited]**********
Pet Friendly:
I am an animal lover, but it may be easier to find a place without your dog. Sorry.
What I`m looking for in you:
You are:
-Respectful of my space and things. Taking my food/drink/whatever without asking is a pet peeve. I also don`t want you going into my room uninvited/unannounced/while I`m not home.
-Able to communicate-if you have an issue let`s lay it out on the table, let`s not be passive aggressive and hold onto stuff forever
-Clean-you can keep common areas clean and generally stay tidy. We`re not in college anymore, let`s be ready for guests at any time.
-Fiscally responsible, with acceptable credit and references.
-A professional-or not undergrad
If you`re interested, respond to the e-mail ASAP with a bit about yourself and I will give you a call or respond if there`s potential. If you have a Facebook or Instagram please share and I`ll do the same.
Thanks
